## Me

Greetings. My name is Joseph Bulbulia. I am a Professor of Psychology at Victoria University of Wellington, a member of the New Zealand Attitudes and Values Senior Leadership Team, a research associate at the Max Plank Institute for the Science of Human History, and an adjunct professor at the University of Canterbury.

## Purpose

The purpose of this site is to convey brief research reports to the public.
